INSERT INTO sales_agg ( bucket_start_time, product_id, product_name, category, orders, units, revenue ) VALUES
( #{row.bucketStartTime, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{row.productId}, #{row.productName}, #{row.category}, #{row.orders}, #{row.units}, #{row.revenue,jdbcType=NUMERIC} )
ON CONFLICT (bucket_start_time, product_id) DO UPDATE SET orders = sales_agg.orders + EXCLUDED.orders, units = sales_agg.units + EXCLUDED.units, revenue = sales_agg.revenue + EXCLUDED.revenue
